name: send systemctl cmd
Set restart CMDS
func:
msg.cmds = ["restart"]
return msg;

name: set cmds
func:
node.send({ "payload": "sudo /bin/systemctl disable comitup" })
node.send({ "payload": "sudo /bin/systemctl stop comitup" })
node.send({ "payload": "/usr/local/sbin/wifi-nuke.py" })
node.send({ "payload": "sudo /usr/bin/nmcli device disconnect wlan0" })

name: Restart Daemons
Set CMDS
func:
let cmds = ""

switch (msg.topic) {
    case "enable":
        cmds = ["enable", "start"]
        break
    case "disable":
        cmds = ["disable", "stop"]
        break
    case "restart":
        cmds = ["restart"]
        break
    default:
        break
}


msg.cmds = cmds
return msg;

name: Current Aircraft Count
function 1
func:
msg.payload = parseFloat(msg.payload).toFixed(1)
return msg;

name: Average CPUs
GPS Mode Lookup
SDR List
Set HTML Payload
Format
Set URL
func:
const pl = msg.payload
let nodeId = pl.match(/NODE_ID=(?<nodeId>[^\n\r]+)/).groups.nodeId
let ssid = `AryaOS-${nodeId.substr(-4, 4)}`

let wifiUrl = `WIFI:S:${ssid};T:;P:;H:false;`
msg.qrcodeinput = wifiUrl
msg.ssid = ssid
return msg;

name: Get Delta
function 3
Set Config Path
func:
msg.confPath = `/home/node-red/${msg.payload}`;

return msg;

label: FEED_URL
tooltip: Where are we getting ADS-B tracks?

label: COT_URL
tooltip: Where are we sending Cursor on Target?

label: ALT_UPPER
tooltip: Upper Altitude Limit, geometric (GNSS / INS) altitude in feet referenced to the WGS84 ellipsoid.

label: ALT_LOWER
tooltip: Lower Altitude Limit, geometric (GNSS / INS) altitude in feet referenced to the WGS84 ellipsoid.

name: Remove nulls
Format ENV file
Use tmp file
func:
msg.tmpConfPath = msg.topic.replace("/etc/", "tmpConf/")

return msg;

name: Set Cmd
Set Configs
func:
let configs = {
    "/etc/adsbcot-config.txt": {
        FEED_URL: "file:///run/adsb/aircraft.json", 
        POLL_INTERVAL: null, 
        ALT_UPPER: null, 
        ALT_LOWER: null
    },
    "/etc/aryaos-config.txt": {
        NODE_ID: null,
        COT_URL: "udp+wo://239.2.3.1:6969",
        PYTAK_MULTICAST_LOCAL_ADDR: "0.0.0.0",
        PYTAK_TLS_CLIENT_CERT: null,
        WIFI_AP_IP: "10.41.0.1",
        COT_ACCESS: "UNCLASSIFIED",
        STATIC_LAT: null,
        STATIC_LON: null,
        STATIC_ALT: null,
        TFR_STATE: "CA",
        PYTAK_TLS_CLIENT_KEY: null,
        PYTAK_TLS_DONT_VERIFY: null,
        PYTAK_TLS_DONT_CHECK_HOSTNAME: null,
        PYTAK_TLS_CLIENT_CAFILE: null,
        PYTAK_TLS_CLIENT_PASSWORD: null,

    },
    "/etc/lincot-config.txt": {
        GPS_INFO_CMD: null,
        CALLSIGN: null
    }
}

flow.set("configs", configs)

return msg;

name: Update User Table
Update Battery Graph
Set Logfile
Set HTML Payload
Set Paylaoad
func:
msg.payload = 'ls -al update.deb;md5sum update.deb;file update.deb'
return msg;
